p: Previous studies have identified several types of activity that firms implement in response to climate change. By building on this research, we propose a comprehensive set of 11 categories of activities: GHG management and policy development, organizational involvement, risk management, product improvements, process improvements, new market and products, supplier involvement, emission trading and compensation, sector and stakeholder cooperation, corporate reporting, and political activities.
